verses.text: \w Then|strong="H6030"\w* Sophar \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Naamathite|strong="H5284"\w* \w answered|strong="H0559"\w*, \w and|strong="H0559"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*:

\w Shall|strong="H0376"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w he|strong="H0518"\w* \w that|strong="H1697"\w* speaketh \w much|strong="H7230"\w*, \w hear|strong="H6663"\w* \w also|strong="H0518"\w*? \w or|strong="H0518"\w* \w shall|strong="H0376"\w* \w a|strong="H0518"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* full \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w talk|strong="H1697"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w justified|strong="H6663"\w*?

\w Shall|strong="H0369"\w* \w men|strong="H4962"\w* hold \w their|strong="H0369"\w* peace \w to|strong="H0369"\w* thee only? \w and|strong="H3932"\w* when thou hast \w mocked|strong="H3932"\w* others, \w shall|strong="H0369"\w* \w no|strong="H0369"\w* \w man|strong="H0369"\w* confute thee?

\w For|strong="H5869"\w* thou hast \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w My|strong="H1961"\w* \w word|strong="H0559"\w* \w is|strong="H1961"\w* \w pure|strong="H2134"\w*, \w and|strong="H5869"\w* \w I|strong="H0559"\w* \w am|strong="H1961"\w* \w clean|strong="H1249"\w* \w in|strong="H1961"\w* thy \w sight|strong="H5869"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1696"\w* \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w wish|strong="H4310"\w* \w that|strong="H4310"\w* \w God|strong="H0433"\w* \w would|strong="H4310"\w* \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* thee, \w and|strong="H1696"\w* \w would|strong="H4310"\w* \w open|strong="H6605"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* \w lips|strong="H8193"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* thee,

\w That|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w might|strong="H0433"\w* shew thee \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w secrets|strong="H8587"\w* \w of|strong="H5771"\w* \w wisdom|strong="H2451"\w*, \w and|strong="H2451"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w his|strong="H3588"\w* law \w is|strong="H2451"\w* manifold, \w and|strong="H2451"\w* thou mightest \w understand|strong="H3045"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* exacteth much \w less|strong="H3588"\w* \w of|strong="H5771"\w* thee, \w than|strong="H3588"\w* thy \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w* deserveth.

Peradventure thou wilt comprehend \w the|strong="H5704"\w* steps \w of|strong="H0433"\w* \w God|strong="H0433"\w*, \w and|strong="H5704"\w* wilt \w find|strong="H4672"\w* \w out|strong="H4672"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* \w Almighty|strong="H7706"\w* perfectly?

\w He|strong="H8064"\w* \w is|strong="H4100"\w* higher than \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w*, \w and|strong="H8064"\w* \w what|strong="H4100"\w* wilt thou \w do|strong="H6466"\w*? \w he|strong="H8064"\w* \w is|strong="H4100"\w* \w deeper|strong="H6013"\w* than hell, \w and|strong="H8064"\w* \w how|strong="H4100"\w* wilt thou \w know|strong="H3045"\w*?

\w The|strong="H4480"\w* \w measure|strong="H4055"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w him|strong="H4480"\w* \w is|strong="H0776"\w* \w longer|strong="H0752"\w* \w than|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w broader|strong="H7342"\w* \w than|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w sea|strong="H3220"\w*.

\w If|strong="H0518"\w* \w he|strong="H0518"\w* \w shall|strong="H4310"\w* overturn all things, \w or|strong="H0518"\w* \w shall|strong="H4310"\w* press \w them|strong="H7725"\w* \w together|strong="H6950"\w*, \w who|strong="H4310"\w* \w shall|strong="H4310"\w* contradict \w him|strong="H7725"\w*?

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* knoweth \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w vanity|strong="H7723"\w* \w of|strong="H3045"\w* \w men|strong="H4962"\w*, \w and|strong="H7200"\w* \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* seeth \w iniquity|strong="H0205"\w*, doth \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w consider|strong="H7200"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w*?

\w A|strong="H3205"\w* vain \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w is|strong="H0376"\w* lifted up \w into|strong="H0376"\w* pride, \w and|strong="H0376"\w* thinketh \w himself|strong="H0376"\w* \w born|strong="H3205"\w* free \w like|strong="H0376"\w* \w a|strong="H3205"\w* \w wild|strong="H6501"\w* assâ€™s \w colt|strong="H5895"\w*.
Rut thou hast hardened thy \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*, \w and|strong="H3820"\w* hast \w spread|strong="H6566"\w* thy \w hands|strong="H3709"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w*.

\w If|strong="H0518"\w* thou wilt \w put|strong="H7368"\w* \w away|strong="H7368"\w* \w from|strong="H3027"\w* thee \w the|strong="H0518"\w* \w iniquity|strong="H0205"\w* \w that|strong="H3027"\w* \w is|strong="H3027"\w* \w in|strong="H7931"\w* thy \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* lot \w not|strong="H0408"\w* \w injustice|strong="H5766"\w* \w remain|strong="H7931"\w* \w in|strong="H7931"\w* thy \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w*:

\w Then|strong="H0227"\w* mayst thou \w lift|strong="H5375"\w* \w up|strong="H5375"\w* thy \w face|strong="H6440"\w* \w without|strong="H3808"\w* \w spot|strong="H3971"\w*, \w and|strong="H6440"\w* thou shalt \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w steadfast|strong="H3332"\w*, \w and|strong="H6440"\w* shalt \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w fear|strong="H3372"\w*.

Thou shalt \w also|strong="H3588"\w* \w forget|strong="H7911"\w* \w misery|strong="H5999"\w*, \w and|strong="H4325"\w* \w remember|strong="H2142"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w* only \w as|strong="H3588"\w* \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H0859"\w* \w passed|strong="H5674"\w* \w away|strong="H5674"\w*.

\w And|strong="H6965"\w* brightness \w like|strong="H1961"\w* \w that|strong="H1961"\w* \w of|strong="H2465"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* noonday, shall \w arise|strong="H6965"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* thee \w at|strong="H1961"\w* evening: \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w when|strong="H1961"\w* thou shalt think thyself consumed, thou shalt \w rise|strong="H6965"\w* \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* \w day|strong="H1242"\w* star.

\w And|strong="H7901"\w* thou shalt \w have|strong="H3426"\w* \w confidence|strong="H0983"\w*, \w hope|strong="H8615"\w* being set before thee, \w and|strong="H7901"\w* being buried thou shalt \w sleep|strong="H7901"\w* \w secure|strong="H0982"\w*.

Thou shalt \w rest|strong="H7257"\w*, \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w there|strong="H0369"\w* \w shall|strong="H6440"\w* \w be|strong="H0369"\w* \w none|strong="H0369"\w* \w to|strong="H0369"\w* \w make|strong="H2729"\w* thee \w afraid|strong="H2729"\w*: \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w many|strong="H7227"\w* \w shall|strong="H6440"\w* \w entreat|strong="H2470"\w* thy \w face|strong="H6440"\w*.

\w But|strong="H7563"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* \w of|strong="H5869"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* \w shall|strong="H5315"\w* decay, \w and|strong="H5869"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* way \w to|strong="H4480"\w* \w escape|strong="H4498"\w* \w shall|strong="H5315"\w* \w fail|strong="H3615"\w* \w them|strong="H3615"\w*, \w and|strong="H5869"\w* \w their|strong="H4480"\w* \w hope|strong="H8615"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* abomination \w of|strong="H5869"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w soul|strong="H5315"\w*.
